name: Kupanda Mlima
description:
Kupanda Mlima means climbing a mountain in swahili.

Welcome to this cool adventure you are about to embark on, get to the peak of this mountain as fast as you can while avoiding the obstacles.

Use powerups to get to the peak, avoid rocks and thorns as you climb.

Control: swipe to move the player.

Contributors: Adeleye Temilade, Olufemi Ajibade, Carla Aluvai, Bakare Adeleke
